item.description:
Join Miss Tall Boston, Sue Flynn, marching in the Worcester Columbus Day Parade.

This parade is a fun filled adventure (approx. 1-1/2 miles) through the Italian neighborhood of the city. The parade is shown on live TV (WCTR-TV 3, Charter Comm.) and replayed many times over. Former royalty are encouraged to attend with sashes & crowns. This will be a great publicity opportunity for the Club.

Special Bonus! After the parade, marchers can return to Sueâ€™s house for a hearty Italian meal.

Directions to Sue's house will be provided when you RSVP "YES".
item.name: March in the Columbus Day Parade in Worcester
